question: Nanotechnology is important because of which benefits?
options: It makes balloons to become nanoballoons
It improves the properties of materials and widens their applications.
It assists in propelling the rocks and fine tuning their speed.
correctAnswer: It improves the properties of materials and widens their applications.

question: Which of the below describes a nanoscale
Which of the below best describes nanoparticles
options: They are very small and cannot be seen with the naked eye, but their scent can be smelled.
These particles are physics related and can only be found in space.
Nanoparticles are under promising research and will be discovered not later than the next 10 years.
correctAnswer: They are very small and cannot be seen with the naked eye, but their scent can be smelled.

question: Which type of materials can be used to make nanomaterials
options: All solid materials can be scaled down to nanomaterials.
Only metals can be scaled down to nanomaterials
correctAnswer: All solid materials can be scaled down to nanomaterials.
